newsitem.title: UK: Williams up after BZW "buy" rating.
newsitem.headline: Williams up after BZW "buy" rating.

text.p: Shares in Williams Holdings Plc rose on Thursday as analyst at BZW repeated a "buy" rating on the stock and said the fire protection and security products group was poised for strong growth, dealers said.
The stock was up 4p at 331 by 1505 GMT in volume of 2.3 million shares, rebounding from an eight-month closing low of 322p set January 14.
BZW analysts argued Williams had achieved a "critical mass" to exploit growth opportunities through international expansion and by launching new products in existing markets, market sources said.
They forecast annual profits growth of ten percent through the year 2000 and pointed out the stock had dropped to the bottom of its recent trading range, sources said.
Analysts at BZW were not immediately available for comment.
